inputs.selection_motivation: The copper‑to‑UST5Y influence is the weakest link, offering the least distinct macro insight compared to the other rate, inflation, equity, and policy connections, and can be safely dropped to accommodate the new ECB policy link.

prioritized_link.motivation: Copper price movements are a leading indicator of global industrial demand and inflation, directly influencing ECB policy decisions.

source_node.query: (copper OR cu OR "copper metal" OR "copper commodity" OR "copper price" OR "copper futures" OR "copper market" OR "copper supply" OR "copper demand" OR "copper mining" OR "copper smelting" OR "copper price forecast" OR "copper price trend" OR "copper price analysis" OR "copper price news" OR "copper price update" OR "copper price volatility" OR "copper price movement" OR "copper price drivers" OR "copper price catalysts" OR "copper price speculation" OR "copper price risk" OR "copper price outlook" OR HG OR HG1 OR HG2 OR COP OR COP1 OR COP2) AND (news OR analysis OR report OR update OR trend OR market OR price OR forecast OR outlook OR volatility OR movement OR drivers OR catalysts OR risk OR speculation)
